SECTION VIII: DEPENDENT CHILDREN

NOTE: Please refer to the Special Circumstances on the instructions page for information regarding dependents and the necessary forms if additional space is
required to list all dependents. If None, skip to Section IX. In most circumstances, children over the age of 23 are not considered dependent for VA purposes.

8A. HOW MANY DEPENDENT CHILDREN LIVE WITH YOU? (Please complete a VA Form 21-686c, Application Request to Add and/or Remove Dependents, if you
need more space for additional dependents.)

2
